content: add this minty-fresh accent to your holiday decor using red heart super saver this crochet pillow is worked in the round from the center out using simple increases and color changes to achieve the overall look the front and back are made separately and then joined and finished off with a super fun interlocking-edge border it s a playful way to add personality and a pop of color to a room materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a cherry red 0319 1 ball or 204 yds/186 5 m contrast b soft white 0316 1 ball or 164 yds/150 m measurement approx 16 40 5 cm diameter
